text: Monica Geller is a fictional character on American sitcom Friends, portrayed by Courteney Cox for 10 seasons. (1994-2004) She worked in a very fancy restaurant. She likes everything in her apartment to be clean. She is known to be a "clean freak". She is married to Chandler Bing. Her brother is Ross Geller. She has two adopted children. They are named Erica and Jack Bing. She has a complicated relationship with her parents. Monica often acts like the mother hen of the group which can be annoying. Category:Fictional American people Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1994 Category:Friends characters
title: Monica Geller
